TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DependencyPropertyConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
Public NotInheritable Class DependencyPropertyConverter Inherits TypeConverter
public ref class DependencyPropertyConverter sealed : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

summary.span: 将字符串转换为 对象。

span.span: Converts from a string to a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类仅将从转换到的实例。The class only converts from a into an instance of . 在转换其他尝试引发异常。Other attempts at conversion throw an exception. 将从转换使用以下输入的格式： *typeName*`.`*propertyName*。The converts from a using the following input format: *typeName*`.`*propertyName*. 格式为*namespacePrefix*:*typeName*`.`*propertyName*也出于传统原因可以接受但*namespacePrefix*： 组件已被忽略。A format of *namespacePrefix*:*typeName*`.`*propertyName* is also accepted for legacy reasons but the *namespacePrefix*: component is ignored. 格式为*propertyName*也在某些情况下; 可以接受这种格式依赖于计算环境的属性和推断出的功能*typeName*，服务实现中上下文。A format of *propertyName* is also accepted in certain cases; this format relies on the ability to evaluate ambient properties and deduce the *typeName*, by service implementation of in the context. 出于传统原因，此类还支持从 BAML 记录，但这是实现详细信息，不能依靠它。For legacy reasons, this class also supports conversion from BAML records, but this is an implementation detail and should not be relied upon. 此转换器的行为专门围绕 XAML 处理的单个 WPF 方案： 读取的属性值并生成值。The behavior of this converter is specifically oriented around a single WPF scenario for XAML processing: reading the attribute value of and generating a value.
